input.sentences: we had a fun night out last night .
everyone had a great time at during our time out .
the bonfire was majestic and illuminated the entire area !
they had great chocolates here | we enjoyed them greatly .
the lighting fixture was amazing | this is such a great place .
output.sentences: Tonight I came home and found my boyfriend drunk in the dining room.
I joined in on the drinking game fun.
He thought he would set a romantic ambiance by lighting a fire.
He sweetly gave me some chocolate.
Afterwards, we all ditched the house and went to a concert with amazing lighting.
